articles.title: Bhangra star Balwinder Safri dies after recovering from coma - BBC
articles.description: Fans of 63-year-old Balwinder Safri pay tribute to the Punjab-born star, from Birmingham.
articles.content:
Bhangra artist Balwinder Safri has died, his family have confirmed.
The Punjab-born star, from Birmingham, had been a part of the UK bhangra scene since 1980 and formed the Safri Boyz Band in 1990. … [+1453 chars]

articles.title: Jodie Comer is single-handedly saving the UK box office - The Telegraph
articles.description: Never mind the Minions or Thor: Comer's one-woman play Prima Facie is the biggest event-cinema release of the pandemic era
articles.content: Minions: The Rise of Gru and Thor: Love and Thunder are well on course to become the sixth and seventh films to pass £30m box office this year in UK and Ireland up from just two that did so in 2021. … [+1456 chars]
